amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funding to implement the Global Compact for Safe, Orderly and Regular Migration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gooden (TX) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gooden (TX) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
